text: Exline is a city in Iowa in the United States. The community was first called Bob community or Caldwell City. The town had to choose an official name after a post office opened in 1877.During the coal boom, Exline expanded significantly. In Exline, United Mine Workers local 812 was established in 1899, and by 1907, it had 200 members. Category:Cities in Iowa
title: Exline, Iowa
